title: 14 Days of Terror
description:
This episode begins with the killing of three suspected IRA terrorists in Gibraltar in 1988 by the SAS.  Feelings ran high in Northern Ireland as the bodies were returned home and 14 days later another six people were dead in related events.
In this episode we examine details of the harrowing events, look closely at the backgrounds of the people involved, and reflect on the lasting legacy of those 14 days of terror.
